title: ArabianFella
author: ArabianFella
created_time: December 26, 2022, 04:41:18 AMLast edit: December 26, 2022, 10:43:47 PM by ArabianFella
content: Hello guys, as mentioned in the tittle I'm starting my own service where I sell my crypto casino and offer support in my discordFor every update I push every customer will have it, I could make custom update too depends on what customer askExample:I've added a new game mode, every customer who had purchased from me will receive it too for free!if you are interested make sure to join my discordhttps://discord.gg/buCD4FM8TTThe website has 4 game modes and 1 hidden game mode:-Crash-Wheel-Jackpot-Coinflipand RPS but cups basedFeatures:-VIP system (bronze, silver, gold, plat, diamond)-Rakeback-SMS verification-Crypto deposit (BTC, ETH, LTC) you can add more-EOS blockchain Provably FairAdmin Panel:-Dashboard (Total depo, withdraw, registered users, profit, most game played)-User information (Lock Account, Transaction, Mute, Ban, add funds, track his gameplay history on site)-Trivia system-Coupon code System-VIP dashboard (Users who reached VIP)-Manual withdraw (Accept/Decline) if you have it enabledDemo: https://poor.rip/admin panel : admin.poor.rip (Post your UID incase you want to see the admin panel)

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: That's very cheap at $150 but at least you can show us a demo of the casino so we can check the difference between your casino and other casinos, or do you have a working model if you don't have a demo, a good casino template usually priced at $500 and you have to add game providers products since yours is in the house might as well check the configuration of your casino

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Indeed, what are the terms of use for the final buyer, because we cannot be sure that sales will not continue after the first purchase and this may be caused by such a low price.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: This thing look so good to be true.I'm so sorry to say but I had to speak my mind and I really don't mean any form of insult or disrespect.I will also suggest you get a copper membership a d show us the proves of what you're trying to say because that would be tye best possible way to get people more easily convince(my opinion though).Through my time of stay on here in the forum, I've noticed that people barely pay any attention to people who want to discuss business outside the forum and even if you're a newbie and want to pass a message, you can start a thread and try to communicate with almost everyone over there.For your case OP, your account is still a newbie account and people wouldn't easily get convinced so I will advice you hire someone to help you on this if you're sure and certain about this.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on December 26, 2022, 05:25:34 AMThat's very cheap at $150 but at least you can show us a demo of the casino so we can check the difference between your casino and other casinos, or do you have a working model if you don't have a demo, a good casino template usually priced at $500 and you have to add game providers products since yours is in the house might as well check the configuration of your casinoit's strange that it's that cheap, especially since the OP didn't provide a DEMO for everyone to see and test how the casino works to make it easier, besides why didn't he just build it himself why should he sell it that cheap, even though it could be profitable for him and become a money machine for him, but I'm not sure the OP sells casinos that cheap it could be just another scam

comments.author: mak013
comments.body: It seems that it is just a try to get $150 for free. I even can`t imagine some working project, that costs $150. The only reason why it can be true that it is some old free script with the one page site. But even if it so - i don`t think that someone can promote such a project to get profit.Anyway i don`t recommend even to try such a deal.

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: Quote from: ArabianFella on December 26, 2022, 12:33:45 PMHey the demo is availabe in my discord server, I didn't post it here so people could join my discord server and check it out and ask few questions feel free to do it if you want toSo the plan is to funnel users into your discord server, a platform where you control the conversation and where you would not have members calling out your bs, as would be the case here.If you are going to announce a service here, you can post the full information for it to be scrutinized by forum members.- Jay -

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on December 26, 2022, 10:22:04 AMFor your case OP, your account is still a newbie account and people wouldn't easily get convinced so I will advice you hire someone to help you on this if you're sure and certain about this.This is true because of your account. Opening of casino is not that easy and you have made it look that way with just $150 and many will see it as suspicious as a trap to get them in first before further request of fund. So this is going to be difficult to come up for you to get positive response. However, discord may not be only channel you can use to show prove of what you have done if you are real.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: This description could imply that the OP could bill more than $150 only, so I wouldn't call this offer too cheap or suspicious because anyone would ask for more customized features than the feature descriptions offered in the end.However, escrow is recommended in this agreement to be more secure.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: I would recommend anyone reading this thread and feel interested on OP's offer to exercise extreme caution and common sense.If something seems too good to be true, usually it is. Implying OP's offer is true and he is offering these services for 150$ that would imply giving support for a significant amount of casinos for little money, which does not sound profitable in the long term. Even if it was, would not this mean we all would see an huge amount of low quality casinos to appear?If one wants to start a casino one needs to know what one is doing and hire people to take care of security, budget, etc. If this is just a sale for a script, then make sure to try the demo.Use common sense.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: ArabianFella on December 26, 2022, 04:41:18 AM-Crypto deposit (BTC, ETH, LTC) you can add moreHello ArabianFella.I have developed casinos in the past, and I could say your price is really low for a project like this. And I have some questions about the deposits and withdrawals. Does your engine handle them or it's a 3rd party service?And what aspects does our server need to run your engine? do you provide the server too and you only provide the script?To be honest, the low price makes me feel like there is something tricky behind this project, feels like a trap.
